results.title: Erte
results.brief_description: Art Deco is perhaps the most important design movement of the Twentieth Century, and Romain de Tirtoff, better known as Erte, is the artist who contributed so much to its development and acceptance as a legitimate art form

results.title: Erskineville kings
results.creator_credit: Julio Caro, Alan White, Beyond Films and @Radical Media
results.brief_description: Barky (Marty Denniss) returns to Sydney after a two-year absence when he hears of the death of his father. He is reunited with his brother (Hugh Jackman) and friends and we learn about their unresolved issues with each other and their father. Cast includes Aaron Blabey, Andrew Wholley, Joel Edgerton and Leah Vandenberg. First time feature produced and directed by Alan White.

results.title: Errigal
results.creator_credit: Aengus Films, Patrick Carey and Vivien Carey
results.brief_description: Errigal is the highest peak of the Decryveagh Mountains in Donegal, Ireland. The mountains and weather impose their own moods on the landscape and the film conveys this feeling of personality in a landscape through the striking use of visuals, music and natural sound

results.title: Erotic ghost story [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Diagonal Pictures, Lan Chan Choi and Ngai Kai Lam
results.brief_description: Three beautiful sisters are really Chinese “fox fairies” who have been granted mortal form in return for doing good deeds. If they resist the temptations of the mortal world, they can eventually achieve immortality. One by one, they each meet a mysterious handsome scholar and make wild, abandoned love with him (and occasionally with each other). Each of the sisters deceives the others about their activities, but eventually they all suspect each other. And when fox hair begins to grow on their bodies, the truth is out. They go to confront the scholar, only to find that he is the god of Carnal Desire, Wu Tung. Basically a soft-porn comedy that also features lush cinematography and costumes, and impressive fight sequences. Cast includes Amy Yip, Man Siu, Pal Sin and Kamimura Kyoko. In Cantonese with English subtitles.

results.title: Erosion
results.creator_credit: United States. Dept. of Agriculture and Soil Conservation Service
results.brief_description: This film relates the story of man-made erosion, showing what it has done to the earth’s productive lands. Sheet and gully erosion by water and sheet erosion by wind and their destructive effects are graphically illustrated. Conservation farming methods can overcome both man-made and natural erosion.
